alert.note: Alert for Hennepin; Wright (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 8:09PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Hennepin and south central Wright Counties through 845 PM CDT... At 808 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Montrose, or near Buffalo, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Delano around 825 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Rockford, Medina, Independence, Maple Plain and Minnetrista. This includes U.S. Highway 12 between mile markers 130 and 140. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
